alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Schuylkill; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 31 at 3:36AM EDT until November 02 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 possible. * WHERE...Southern Clinton, Southern Lycoming, Columbia and Schuylkill Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions will damage sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread sub-freezing temperatures Wednesday night into early Thursday morning will likely bring and end to the growing season.
info.instruction: Take protective measures now as freezing temperatures could damage or kill tender plants and vegetation. Potted plants should be brought inside.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Schuylkill; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming
